channel.title: Software on drasyl provides secure, software-defined overlay networks, connecting all your devices
channel.description: Recent content in Software on drasyl provides secure, software-defined overlay networks, connecting all your devices

item.title: SkABNet: A Attribut-Based SkipNet built on drasyl
item.description: Today we would like to present you another use case of drasyl: A colleague of ours developed a distributed data structure based on the SkipNet presented by Microsoft. In addition to that, he added capabilities to store multi-attributed data on a SkipNet.
